data.name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2: Pawns No More: Making The Hunger Games: Mockingjay Part 2
data.detailed_description: A feature-length documentary providing an immersive look at the creation of the final film in The Hunger Games saga. Featuring dozens of in-depth, exclusive interviews with the cast and crew, this is the culminating behind the scenes chapter of the unforgettable cinematic vision of Suzanne Collins’ magnificent story.
